arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Redshift Subnet group name

description.description: The description of the Redshift Subnet group. Defaults to "Managed by Pulumi".

name.description: The name of the Redshift Subnet group.

subnetIds.description: An array of VPC subnet IDs.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering SubnetGroup resources.
